title: Pixel 2 XL screen frozen
content:
Screen is frozen.
  I have tried most of the troubleshooting options that are listed on internet.
only option has not been done only factory reset.
i don't wanna do it unless back up the phone.
  i can't even backup the phone as it is not responding at all. 
even phone is connected in to laptop, the phone is not showing on laptop.
  Thanks,
